Hosterlabs – Windows KVM VPS hosted in Canada from just $4.99/month with 2GB RAM!

canada, hosterlabs, ipv6, kvm, linux, nvme, windows July 27, 2020 @ 6:53 am, by Jon Biloh

Jacobo from Hosterlabs submitted their first exclusive offer to LowEndBox a few weeks ago and we are excited to share it with you today. As we recommend with all first-time providers to be published on LowEndBox we recommend that you pay monthly only. We like that the offer includes NVMe based storage on both the Windows and Linux plans, as that will help ensure that users will enjoy fast IO speeds.

Their WHOIS is public, and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs on their website. They are a registered company in Mexico (COPJ010609CVA). They accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card and Bitcoin as payment methods.

A little about HostUP in their own words: 

“We are a web hosting company focused on providing our customers the best technical support available. We specialize in virtual private servers in windows and linux. We have all the technical expertise to help users develop websites, apps or any need they require with our included dedicated support.”

Here are their offers: 

Windows 2GB Basic

  • 2GB RAM
  • 1x vCPU
  • 20GB NVMe RAID 1
  • 1TB Transfer
  • Up to 5 IPv4
  • /80 IPv6 upon request
  • Solus VM
  • $4.99/month
  • [ORDER HERE]

Windows 4GB Plus

  • 4GB RAM
  • 2x vCPU
  • 30GB NVMe RAID 1
  • 10TB Transfer
  • Up to 5 IPv4
  • /80 IPv6 upon request
  • Solus VM
  • $9.99/month
  • [ORDER HERE]

Linux 2GB Basic

  • 2GB RAM
  • 1GB Swap
  • 1x vCPU
  • 20GB NVMe RAID 1
  • 1TB Transfer
  • Up to 5 IPv4
  • /80 IPv6 upon request
  • Solus VM
  • $2.99/month
  • [ORDER HERE]

Linux 4GB Plus

  • 4GB RAM
  • 2GB Swap
  • 2x vCPU
  • 30GB NVMe RAID 1
  • 10TB Transfer
  • Up to 5 IPv4
  • /80 IPv6 upon request
  • Solus VM
  • $5.99/month
  • [ORDER HERE]

More information about Hosterlabs plus network information and host node specifications after the break.

A little more about Hosterlabs:
  • Our company focuses on customer support and customer satisfaction. We will go to great extents to assure that our customers are happy. Our services are reliable, have had 0 downtime and are constantly updated. In any case a customer is unhappy he can apply to our 30-day warranty. If they are unhappy we will refund the entirety of what they paid. Also, we have technicians with 6 or more years of experience working for us. They are capable. We will find a solution for your problems and we will help with what most providers will not. We offer 24/7 support on our shared hosting plans with 1 hour response times.
  • We are hosterlabs.net, we were grounded in 2017. At first we focused on private customers only. We made custom solutions for a few websites and managed them. Some examples of the websites we have managed and helped build with other tools specific to our clients:

http://jacobochoy.com
https://doctorchoy.com
https://cecgcdmx.com

  • We think about our customer and their needs first. We give dedicated customer support to each client and assure satisfaction with our products. As well as offering scalability and reliability. Additionally,  all our vps nodes are stored in eco-friendly datacenter with 100% reliable energy sources. We are conscious about the environment we live, the society we are in and our customers. We are not just a company, we are dedicated into improving the environment we live in. In the future, we are planning on donating to charitable foundations a portion of our profits.

Beauharnois, Quebec, Canada.
test IPv4 : 142.44.138.56
test IPv6 : 2607:5300:203:2138::

Host Node Specifications:

– Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1230v6
– 64GB RAM
– 2x nVME 450GB Datacenter Edition
– Hardware RAID1
– 1Gbps uplink

Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!
